title: Product Manager (Adobe Experience Manager Focus)
description:
**Overview:**

Lead the strategic development of digital experience solutions powered by Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) to drive customer engagement, brand consistency, and operational efficiency. Act as the connective tissue between business objectives and technical execution—translating user needs into scalable, content-centric digital experiences that support marketing, customer service, and enterprise communication goals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

As the AEM Product Manager, you will lead the strategic vision, planning, and execution of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) solutions to enhance digital experiences across web and mobile platforms. You’ll gather insights from marketers, content authors, developers, and end users to inform a product roadmap that aligns with business goals, customer needs, and platform capabilities. Partnering with UX, SEO, and content teams, you’ll map user journeys and guide the development of scalable components, templates, and authoring workflows that drive content velocity and engagement. You will manage discovery sessions and workshops to identify optimization opportunities, prioritize features based on impact and feasibility, and translate requirements into actionable user stories and a well-groomed product backlog. Through close coordination with IT, development, and compliance teams, you’ll ensure timely delivery of AEM enhancements that meet brand, accessibility, and legal standards. As an Agile leader, you’ll facilitate sprint planning, retrospectives, and cross-functional collaboration while monitoring performance metrics and KPIs to inform continuous improvement. Finally, you will act as a key communicator of product strategy and progress to stakeholders across marketing, technology, and executive leadership, championing the value and impact of the AEM platform.

**Qualifications:**

* 5+ years of product management experience, preferably with enterprise CMS or DXPs (Digital Experience Platforms).
* 2+ years of hands-on experience with Adobe Experience Manager (Sites, Assets, or Forms).
* Strong understanding of web content strategy, personalization, and front-end user experience.
* Experience with Agile methodologies and product development lifecycle.
* Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and cross-functional collaboration skills.
* Familiarity with Adobe Marketing Cloud, DAM systems, and customer data platforms is a plus.

**Preferred Experience:**

* Experience in regulated industries (e.g., healthcare, finance, or government) is a strong plus.
* Background in customer journey design, omnichannel campaign execution, or digital publishing workflows.
* Knowledge of accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG) and content governance frameworks.

title: Senior Manager, Product Learning  (Automotive DMS)
description:
**About Tekion:**
Positively disrupting an industry that has not seen any innovation in over 50 years, Tekion has challenged the paradigm with the first and fastest cloud-native automotive platform that includes the revolutionary Automotive Retail Cloud (ARC) for retailers, Automotive Enterprise Cloud (AEC) for manufacturers and other large automotive enterprises and Automotive Partner Cloud (APC) for technology and industry partners. Tekion connects the entire spectrum of the automotive retail ecosystem through one seamless platform. The transformative platform uses cutting-edge technology, big data, machine learning, and AI to seamlessly bring together OEMs, retailers/dealers and consumers. With its highly configurable integration and greater customer engagement capabilities, Tekion is enabling the best automotive retail experiences ever. Tekion employs close to 3,000 people across North America, Asia and Europe.
  
  

* Experience in Automotive DMS implementation required

If you're a seasoned learning professional who excels at managing the big picture rather than individual components, this role is your opportunity to shine. As our Senior Manager of Product Learning, you'll be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive virtual learning programs and processes that elevate our entire training ecosystem. In this high-impact position, you'll drive operational excellence by architecting, implementing, and managing end-to-end virtual learning processes that transform how our dealer partner's master our products and methodologies across our organization. Your focus will be on creating scalable, efficient virtual learning processes rather than just content delivery.
  
  
**Key Responsibilities**
**Virtual Learning Process Management**

* Design and implement comprehensive virtual learning processes from needs assessment to delivery and evaluation
* Establish standardized frameworks for virtual learning that ensure consistency across all training initiatives
* Develop scalable process models that can adapt to changing business requirements
* Create governance structures for virtual learning process implementation and maintenance
* Lead continuous improvement initiatives for all virtual learning processes based on data-driven insights
* Build and refine learning process workflows that optimize resource utilization

**Virtual Learning Technology & System Integration**

* Lead the strategic implementation and optimization of our Learning Management System (LMS) and related technologies
* Architect comprehensive virtual learning technology ecosystems that integrate multiple platforms and tools
* Develop and document standard operating procedures for all virtual learning technologies
* Establish metrics and analytics frameworks to evaluate technology effectiveness and ROI
* Create system integration models that connect virtual learning platforms with other enterprise systems
* Implement automation and workflow enhancements to streamline virtual learning delivery

**Learning Strategy & Process Innovation**

* Develop enterprise-wide virtual learning strategies aligned with business objectives
* Create frameworks for translating automotive industry knowledge into scalable learning processes
* Establish standardized methodologies for virtual content development and delivery
* Design learning journeys and process maps for different roles and competency levels
* Research and implement innovative virtual learning approaches to maximize engagement and retention
* Develop measurement strategies to evaluate learning effectiveness and business impact

**Team Leadership**

* Coach teams on process consistency and best practices
* Provide mentorship to ensure training quality and knowledge transfer
* Collaborate with department heads to align training initiatives with business objectives
* Lead cross-functional training programs to improve tool utilization and process adherence
* Prioritize training initiatives based on business impact and strategic objectives

**Skills and Experience**

* 5+ years of process design and implementation in learning environments
* 3+ years experience in Automotive DMS software implementation or Learning and Development
* 3+ years of virtual learning management system administration and optimization
* 3+ years experience designing and implementing virtual learning processes and workflows
* Demonstrated expertise in learning technology ecosystem management and integration
* Strong understanding of automotive software implementation and support processes
* Experience with process mapping, workflow design, and continuous improvement methodologies
* Bachelor's degree in business, education, automotive technology, or related field
* Ability to travel up to 25%

**Preferred Skills**

* Experience implementing and managing enterprise-wide virtual learning processes
* Knowledge of learning experience platforms (LXP) and integration with LMS systems
* Experience with virtual learning analytics and reporting systems
* Familiarity with process automation tools for learning delivery
* Automotive industry knowledge a plus

**Perks and Benefits**

* Competitive compensation and generous stock options
* 100% employer-paid top-of-the-line medical, dental and vision coverage
* Great benefits including unlimited PTO, parental leave and free snacks and beverages
* The opportunity to work with some of the brightest minds from Silicon Valley's most dominant and successful companies
* Be part of an early stage, hyper-growth start-up with the opportunity to grow and prosper
* Work on the latest and coolest technologies – everything is home-grown and built ground-up
* A dynamic work environment with a strong sense of community and collaboration
* The open and transparent culture that encourages innovation, rewards performance and discourages hierarchy
* Exciting opportunities for career growth and development

**Current Tekion Employees – Please apply via Greenhouse Internal Job Board**
The salary range describes the minimum to maximum base salary range for this position across applicable US locations. The actual compensation offered may vary from the posted hiring range based on geographic location, work experience, education, licensure requirements and/or skill level and will be finalized at the time of offer.  In addition to the compensation listed, this position may be eligible for equity compensation, and a bonus or commission whereby total compensation may exceed base salary depending on individual or company performance. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range during the hiring process.
  
  
Base Salary Range
  
  
$107,500—$158,100 USD
